歸.definition: to return; to go back to; to give back to; (of a responsibility) to be taken care of by; to belong to; to gather together; (used between two identical verbs) despite; to marry (of a woman) (old); division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

歸仁.definition: Gueiren, a district in Tainan 台南|台南[Tai2 nan2], Taiwan

歸位.definition: to put sth back where it belongs; to return to the original position; to return to one's seat (in a classroom)

歸併.definition: to put together; to add; to merge

歸依.definition: to convert to (a religion); to rely upon; refuge; mainstay

歸僑.definition: Chinese person who returns to China after living as an expatriate

歸入.definition: to assign (to a class); to classify as; to include

歸公.definition: to commandeer; to take over for the state

歸功.definition: to give credit; to give sb his due; attribution

歸口.definition: to return to one's original trade; to put (a business etc) under the administration of the relevant central authority; (the) relevant (department in charge of sth)

歸咎.definition: to put the blame on; to accuse

歸國.definition: to go home (to one's native country); to return from abroad

歸宿.definition: place to return to; home; final destination; ending

歸寧.definition: (literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents

歸屬.definition: to belong to; to be affiliated to; to fall under the jurisdiction of; a place where one feels that one belongs; one's final destination (where one need look no further)

歸心似箭.definition: with one's heart set on speeding home (idiom)

歸攏.definition: to gather; to rake together; to pile up

歸於.definition: to belong to; affiliated to; to result in sth; to incline towards

歸根.definition: to return home (after a lifetime's absence); to go back to one's roots

歸根到底.definition: after all; in the final analysis; ultimately

歸根結柢.definition: variant of 歸根結底|归根结底[gui1 gen1 jie2 di3]

歸根結蒂.definition: ultimately; in the final analysis; after all; when all is said and done

歸案.definition: to bring to justice; to file away (a document)

歸檔.definition: to file away; to place on file

歸正.definition: to return to the right path; to mend one's ways; to reform; Reformed (church etc)

歸省.definition: to go home for a visit; to return to one's parents' home to pay respects

歸真.definition: to die (Buddhism); to return to Allah (Islam)

歸真返璞.definition: see 返璞歸真|返璞归真[fan3 pu2 gui1 zhen1]

歸納.definition: to sum up; to summarize; to conclude from facts; induction (method of deduction in logic)

歸結.definition: to sum up; to conclude; to put in a nutshell; conclusion; end (of a story etc)

歸綏.definition: old name for Hohhot city 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia

歸置.definition: (coll.) to put (things) back; to tidy up; to put in order

歸西.definition: to die (euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise)

歸謬法.definition: reductio ad absurdum; arguing by contradiction; also called 反證法|反证法

歸途.definition: the way back; one's journey home

歸附.definition: to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc); to submit

歸除.definition: long division; calculation on the abacus

歸隊.definition: to return to one's unit; to go back to one's station in life

歸隱.definition: to go back to one's native place and live in seclusion

歸零.definition: to reset to zero; (fig.) to start again from scratch; to go back to square one

歸順.definition: to surrender and pay allegiance to
